main.title: [Well-being Farm]
main.subTitle: Spring Healing: Green Tea Picking & Traditional Tea Making Experience
main.description: Activity: Join the farm expert to pick the most precious and tender "one bud and two leaves"(일심삼엽) of young green tea shoots. A time of healing to purify your mind and body amidst the sounds of nature.

info.location: Freshness Well-being Green Tea Farm (123 Nokcha-ro, Yongin-si, Gyeonggi-do)

main.title: [Mindful Movement]
main.subTitle: Forest Bathing & Mindful Yoga: Healing in Nature
main.description: Activity: Experience a slow, deep mindful walk (forest bathing) followed by a gentle yoga and meditation session. Connect your breath with nature for stress relief and inner peace.

info.location: Seoulsup Park Healing Zone (Gathering Point: Park Information Center)
info.fee: ₩28,000 per person (Includes yoga mat rental & herbal tea)
info.preparation: Water bottle, comfortable outdoor wear, personal towel (optional)

main.title: [Healthy Cooking]
main.subTitle: Seasonal Vegan Baking Class: Making Grain-free Cookies
main.description: Activity: Hands-on cooking class focusing on healthy, plant-based desserts. Learn to bake delicious, grain-free cookies and treats using seasonal, locally sourced ingredients.

info.location: The Good Food Kitchen (789 Cooking-daero, Gangnam-gu, Seoul)
info.fee: ₩45,000 per person (Includes ingredients, recipe, and take-home dessert)

main.title: [Digital Detox]
main.subTitle: Star Gazing & Deep Relaxation Meditation
main.description: Activity: Join a guided deep relaxation (Savasana-style) meditation session under the night sky. Learn techniques to quiet the mind and fully appreciate the natural beauty of the stars.

info.location: Gapyeong Nature Recreation Forest (Designated open area)
info.fee: ₩15,000 per person (Includes hot blanket and eye mask)
info.preparation: Warm blanket or shawl, comfortable reclining chair (optional)

main.title: [Art Therapy]
main.subTitle: Mandala Drawing Workshop: Finding Inner Peace Through Patterns
main.description: Activity: A guided art therapy session focused on creating intricate Mandala patterns. This focused activity promotes concentration, reduces anxiety, and encourages self-reflection.

info.location: Gallery Art Space (B1, Healing Center, Jongno-gu, Seoul)
info.fee: ₩30,000 per person (Includes all art materials and frame)

main.title: [Aroma Blending]
main.subTitle: Personalized Aromatherapy: Custom Essential Oil Blending Workshop
main.description: Activity: Learn the basics of aromatherapy and blend your own custom essential oil roller or room spray. Utilize the power of scent to manage stress and promote relaxation.

info.location: Scent of Healing Studio (456 Harmony-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul)
info.fee: ₩35,000 per person (Includes all materials and take-home custom blend)
